snippet: Pete Carroll, who coached Seattle to a Super Bowl victory, received a three-year contract extension.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Seattle Seahawks give coach Pete Carroll a three-year contract extension through the 2016 season; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pete Carroll, who coached Seattle to a Super Bowl victory, received a three-year contract extension.

headline.print_headline: Seahawks Sign Carroll Through 2016; the Titans Release Their Top Rusher
